title: Film & Animation
description: Film and Animation category mostly used by big brands and production houses.

title: Autos & Vehicles
description: Autos & Vehicles category includes video related to cars, bikes automobiles technology, customized vehicles and much more.

title: Music
description: Music category includes videos related to all kind of music, songs and related content.

title: Pets & Animals
description: Pets and Animals category includes videos like pet or animal training, tips, related products, breed info, funny moves/reactions and more.

title: Sports
description: Sports category includes videos for sports, sport equipment, accessories, tips, amazing moments, statistics, guide or coaching and sports related activities.

title: Travel & Events
description: Travel and Events category is best suitable for traveling tips, travel places, holiday places list, event videos, event organization and more related to both things.

title: Gaming
description: Gaming category includes videos for games info, game hacks, tips, game reviews, live playing and more related things.

title: People & Blogs
description: This category includes videos for people, life style, celebrity talks, things about people, popular blog or sites information, website promotion, reviews and more related to people or blogs thing.

title: Comedy
description: Comedy category includes different type of videos which generate comedy; it may be stand up speech, short story, animation story, any funny videos for comedy.

title: Entertainment
description: Entertainment is popular category and includes range of video topics. You can easily identify that some type of videos (e.g., Dance, Drama, Fun, Story etc.,) comes under this category.

title: News & Politics
description: News and Politics category needs fresh and trending content. This category includes short news, news type information, politics related things, media and other category related videos.

title: Howto & Style
description: How to and Style category includes two type of categories. One is how to guide and second is style or fashion.

title: Education
description: Education category includes tutorial, knowledge guide, learning, academic classes and informative topic videos.

title: Science & Technology
description: Technology is future, so, content related to this category always get more views.

title: Nonprofits & Activism
description: If you check simple meaning of Nonprofits i.e. (things without any profit or profit intention), and Activism, you will get best idea for Nonprofits & Activism category.
